          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical detection: lithium sulphate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Abfragung: Lithiumsulfat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détection chimique : sulfate de lithium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deteção química: sulphate do lítio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rilevazione chimica: solfato del litio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική ανίχνευση: θειικό άλας λίθιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Detección química: sulfato del litio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of four illustrations demonstrating a sequence of tests performed to identify what compounds are present in four test solutions. This shows that the solution being tested contains lithium sulphate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">barium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen flame</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">detection</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flame test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lithium sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">precipitates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von vier Abbildungen, die eine Reihenfolge
der Tests durchgeführt, um zu kennzeichnen zeigen, welche Mittel in 
vier Testlösungen anwesend sind. Dieses zeigt, daß die 
Lösung, die geprüft wird, Lithiumsulfat enthält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de quatre illustrations démontrant un 
ordre des essais réalisés pour identifier quels composés sont 
présents dans quatre solutions d'essai. Ceci prouve que la 
solution étant testée contient le sulfate de lithium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de quatro ilustrações que 
demonstram uma seqüência dos testes executados para identificar que 
compostos estão atuais em quatro soluções do teste. Isto 
mostra que a solução que está sendo testada contem o sulphate do 
lítio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di quattro illustrazioni che 
dimostrano una sequenza delle prove effettuate per identificare che 
residui sono presenti in quattro soluzioni della prova. Ciò 
indica che la soluzione che è esaminata contiene il solfato del 
litio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που καταδεικνύουν μια 
ακολουθία δοκιμών που εκτελούνται για να προσδιορίσουν ποιες 
ενώσεις είναι παρούσες σε τέσσερις λύσεις δοκιμής. Αυτό 
δείχνει ότι η λύση που εξετάζεται περιέχει το θειικό άλας 
λίθιου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de cuatro ilustraciones que demuestran 
una secuencia de las pruebas realizadas para identificar qué 
compuestos están presentes en cuatro soluciones de la prueba. 
Esto muestra que la solución que es probada contiene el sulfato
del litio.</string>
          </description>
